Search the NLM NPI Registry

Source: R/end_nppes.R
nppes_nlm.Rd

Search the NLM NPI Registry

Usage

nppes_nlm(terms)

Source

API Documentation

Arguments

terms

<chr> Search terms, separated by spaces

Value

<tibble> of search results

Examples

nppes_nlm("john bethesda")
#> → 135 Results ☰ 1 Requests
#> # A tibble: 135 × 4
#>    name            npi        specialty                                  address
#>    <chr>           <chr>      <chr>                                      <chr>  
#>  1 KELLY, JOHN     1760880173 Dentist                                    4833 B…
#>  2 VAVREK, JOHN    1801864624 Military Health Care Provider              NNMC B…
#>  3 SCHACHT, JOHN   1760801047 Medical Genetics and Genomics              WR, 89…
#>  4 WAGGONER, JOHN  1104320076 Physician/General Surgery                  8901 W…
#>  5 BEIGEL, JOHN    1396705372 Physician/Internal Medicine                10 CEN…
#>  6 TOERGE, JOHN    1376542282 Physician/Physical Medicine and Rehabilit… 6410 R…
#>  7 HIGGINS, JOHN   1184702201 Dentist                                    5648 S…
#>  8 ORISASONA, JOHN 1760833891 Home Health Aide                           3812 B…
#>  9 NEAL, JOHN      1295710713 Dentist                                    8901 R…
#> 10 WEEKS, JOHN     1750077236 Military Health Care Provider              8901 W…
#> # ℹ 125 more rows
